statements: SELECT user_id, content_id, engagement_type, timestamp, duration_seconds FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, content_id FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE duration_seconds > 60;
SELECT engagement_type, COUNT(*) FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY engagement_type;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, duration_seconds FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_id, AVG(duration_seconds) AS avg_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY content_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_duration DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_type IN ('view', 'like') LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM user_engagement_metrics GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_engagements DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics
SELECT user_id, engagement_level FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_level = 'high'
SELECT content_id, timestamp, duration_seconds FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM audience_behavior WHERE rating > 4.0
SELECT audience_id, page_views, unique_visitors FROM audience_behavior ORDER BY unique_visitors ASC
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT content_id, engagement_level FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(duration_seconds) AS longest_duration FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT audience_id, content_id, unique_visitors, page_views FROM audience_behavior WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT content_id FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM media_content ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM media_content WHERE content_type='video';
SELECT content_title, content_type, publish_date FROM media_content WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_time FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM audience_behavior WHERE behavior_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT * FROM media_content WHERE content_type = 'video' ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, content_title, publish_date FROM media_content WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' AND publish_date < '2023-01-01';

SELECT content_title, COUNT(*) AS engagement_count FROM user_engagement JOIN media_content ON user_engagement.content_id = media_content.content_id GROUP BY content_title ORDER BY engagement_count DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT content_type, AVG(DATEDIFF(engagement_time, publish_date)) AS avg_days_since_publish FROM media_content JOIN user_engagement ON media_content.content_id = user_engagement.content_id GROUP BY content_type ORDER BY avg_days_since_publish DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS unique_users FROM audience_behavior GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY unique_users DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_name, genre FROM media_content WHERE content_type = 'Movie';
SELECT audience_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM audience_behavior GROUP BY audience_id;
SELECT * FROM audience_preferences WHERE audience_id = 3 AND genre_preference = 'Action';
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_timestamp FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY engagement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT content_name, genre FROM media_content WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT audience_id, COUNT(*) AS total_engagements FROM audience_behavior GROUP BY audience_id HAVING total_engagements > 5;
SELECT audience_id, genre_preference, content_type_preference FROM audience_preferences WHERE genre_preference = 'Comedy';

SELECT ue.user_id, mc.content_name, ab.engagement_type, ab.engagement_timestamp FROM user_engagement_metrics ue INNER JOIN media_content mc ON ue.content_id = mc.content_id INNER JOIN audience_behavior ab ON ue.user_id = ab.audience_id WHERE ue.engagement_type = 'share' ORDER BY ab.engagement_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, rating FROM UserEngagementMetrics ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, category, publication_date FROM DigitalMediaContent WHERE category = 'News' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, total_views, likes FROM ContentAnalytics WHERE total_views > 1000 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserEngagementMetrics WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, category FROM DigitalMediaContent WHERE category = 'Science Fiction' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_id, total_views, unique_views FROM ContentAnalytics WHERE total_views > 1000 ORDER BY total_views DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
